fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player at night. They will die, no matter what.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, a random faction (with a factional kill) will be selected. All kills done by you will appear to have been from that faction. It may or may not be an actual faction in the game, it just needs to have a factional kill.
- Roleblock, control, and redirect immune. Your ability also cannot fail, under any circumstance.
- You have no penalty for killing Townies.
- You must kill someone every night.
